documentation.text:
@dev This abstract contract is inherited by almost all contracts of "Web3 Direct Democracy" (except "DemoCoin" token and ballot contracts inheriting from "IVote" interface). 
 It gathers some common features such as constitution address handling.
@dev Check that the caller address is the {Constitution_Address}
@notice Address of the constitution of the DAO

@dev Set the name of the new institution and the address of the constitution.
 @param name Name of the new institution

@dev The function Allows to change the Constitution contract the current Institution obey to. The function is only callable by the {Constitution_Address}
 @param new_constitution Address of the new Constitution contract.

@dev This abstract contract is inherited by almost all contracts of "Web3 Direct Democracy" (except "DemoCoin" token and ballot contracts inheriting from "IVote" interface). 
 It gathers some common features such as constitution address handling.
@dev Check that the caller address is the {Constitution_Address}
@notice Address of the constitution of the DAO

@dev Set the name of the new institution and the address of the constitution.
 @param name Name of the new institution

@dev The function Allows to change the Constitution contract the current Institution obey to. The function is only callable by the {Constitution_Address}
 @param new_constitution Address of the new Constitution contract.

devdoc.details: This abstract contract is inherited by almost all contracts of "Web3 Direct Democracy" (except "DemoCoin" token and ballot contracts inheriting from "IVote" interface).  It gathers some common features such as constitution address handling.

Set_Constitution(address).details: The function Allows to change the Constitution contract the current Institution obey to. The function is only callable by the {Constitution_Address}

params.new_constitution: Address of the new Constitution contract.

constructor.details: Set the name of the new institution and the address of the constitution.

Constitution_Address().notice: Address of the constitution of the DAO
